page.title: 14WALPOLE NEWS
page.content: Each month a small group of volunteers organise the making of the WALPOLE NEWS. This local newsheet, of three or four pages of duplicated foolscap news, is distributed to every home in the parish. It is free but its revenue comes from the sale of advertising space. The advertisers are mostly local. The news is sent in to the organisers MRS. IRENE HUNTER and MRS AUDREY CLARK. There is, in addition, a small competition. These contributions are normally typed and duplicated at home before being sent out in the village. For many people they are the only way of keeping in close contact with the organisations in the village and of the events held locally.
